mapper.select:
select * from ( select
distinct
, (select count(id) from order_task A where del_flag!=1 and status=7 and A.parent_id=order_task.id) complate, (select count(id) from order_task B where del_flag!=1 and B.parent_id=order_task.id ) total from order_task left join sys_file on order_task.icon_id = sys_file.id left join order_receive on order_task.id = order_receive.order_id and order_receive.receiver_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} left join sys_confirm on sys_confirm.type=#{confirmType,jdbcType=TINYINT} and order_task.id = sys_confirm.order_id and (one_partner_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or sec_partner_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and is_current=1 left join (select sys_user.id user_id,sys_file.id launcher_file_id,sys_file.origin_name launcher_file_origin_name, sys_file.name launcher_file_name,sys_file.create_date launcher_file_create_date from sys_user,sys_file where sys_user.icon = sys_file.id) A on A.user_id = order_task.launcher_id ) order_task
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from order_task left join sys_file on order_task.icon_id = sys_file.id left join (select sys_user.id user_id,sys_file.id launcher_file_id,sys_file.origin_name launcher_file_origin_name, sys_file.name launcher_file_name,sys_file.create_date launcher_file_create_date from sys_user,sys_file where sys_user.icon = sys_file.id) A on A.user_id = order_task.launcher_id where order_task.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into order_task (id, order_number, create_date, last_update_date, last_update_userid, order_name, status, del_flag, launcher_id, receiver_id, remark, info_obli_1, info_obli_2, info_obli_3, info_obli_4, name, description, introduce, type, requirements, money, order_receiver_id, end_time, launcher_status, receiver_status, parent_id, icon_id, sort_num, orinin_money) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateUserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{launcherId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infoObli1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infoObli2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infoObli3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infoObli4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{requirements,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{money,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{orderReceiverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{launcherStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{receiverStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iconId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orininMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE})

mapper.select:
select count(distinct id)from (select
distinct
, (select count(id) from order_task A where del_flag!=1 and status=7 and A.parent_id=order_task.id) complate, (select count(id) from order_task B where del_flag!=1 and B.parent_id=order_task.id ) total from order_task left join sys_file on order_task.icon_id = sys_file.id inner join order_receive on order_receive.order_id = order_task.id left join (select sys_user.id user_id,sys_file.id launcher_file_id,sys_file.origin_name launcher_file_origin_name, sys_file.name launcher_file_name,sys_file.create_date launcher_file_create_date from sys_user,sys_file where sys_user.icon = sys_file.id) A on A.user_id = order_task.launcher_id ) order_task
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.update:
update order_task
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_number = #{record.orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_update_date = #{record.lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_update_userid = #{record.lastUpdateUserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_name = #{record.orderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{record.status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
del_flag = #{record.delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
launcher_id = #{record.launcherId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiver_id = #{record.receiverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_obli_1 = #{record.infoObli1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_obli_2 = #{record.infoObli2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_obli_3 = #{record.infoObli3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_obli_4 = #{record.infoObli4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
introduce = #{record.introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{record.type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
requirements = #{record.requirements,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
money = #{record.money,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
order_receiver_id = #{record.orderReceiverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_time = #{record.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
launcher_status = #{record.launcherStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
receiver_status = #{record.receiverStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
parent_id = #{record.parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon_id = #{record.iconId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort_num = #{record.sortNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
orinin_money = #{record.orininMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE},

update order_task set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_number = #{record.orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_update_date = #{record.lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_update_userid = #{record.lastUpdateUserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_name = #{record.orderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{record.status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, del_flag = #{record.delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, launcher_id = #{record.launcherId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_id = #{record.receiverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_obli_1 = #{record.infoObli1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_obli_2 = #{record.infoObli2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_obli_3 = #{record.infoObli3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_obli_4 = #{record.infoObli4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, introduce = #{record.introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{record.type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, requirements = #{record.requirements,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money = #{record.money,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, order_receiver_id = #{record.orderReceiverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_time = #{record.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, launcher_status = #{record.launcherStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, receiver_status = #{record.receiverStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, parent_id = #{record.parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon_id = #{record.iconId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort_num = #{record.sortNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, orinin_money = #{record.orininMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}

order_number = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_update_date = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_update_userid = #{lastUpdateUserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_name = #{orderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
launcher_id = #{launcherId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiver_id = #{receiverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_obli_1 = #{infoObli1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_obli_2 = #{infoObli2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_obli_3 = #{infoObli3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info_obli_4 = #{infoObli4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
introduce = #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
requirements = #{requirements,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
money = #{money,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
order_receiver_id = #{orderReceiverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
launcher_status = #{launcherStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update order_task set order_number = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_update_date = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_update_userid = #{lastUpdateUserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_name = #{orderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, launcher_id = #{launcherId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_id = #{receiverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_obli_1 = #{infoObli1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_obli_2 = #{infoObli2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_obli_3 = #{infoObli3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info_obli_4 = #{infoObli4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, introduce = #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, requirements = #{requirements,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money = #{money,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, order_receiver_id = #{orderReceiverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, launcher_status = #{launcherStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, receiver_status = #{receiverStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon_id = #{iconId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort_num = #{sortNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, orinin_money = #{orininMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql: order_task.*,sys_file.id file_id,sys_file.create_date file_create_date,sys_file.origin_name file_origin_name,sys_file.name file_name,IFNULL(order_receive.receive_status,0) order_receive_status, (CASE WHEN one_partner_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} THEN one_partner_status WHEN sec_partner_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} THEN sec_partner_status else null END) partner_status, (CASE WHEN one_partner_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} THEN on_partner_remark WHEN sec_partner_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} THEN sec_partner_remark else null END) partner_remark, (CASE WHEN one_partner_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} THEN one_partner_date WHEN sec_partner_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} THEN sec_partner_date else null END) partner_date, sys_confirm.one_partner_status one_partner_status, sys_confirm.sec_partner_status sec_partner_status, sys_confirm.result sys_confirm_result, sys_confirm.id sys_confirm_id, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} partner_id, (select sum(money) from order_task a where parent_id=order_task.id and del_flag!=1) sum,A.*
mapper.select:
select * from ( select
distinct
, (select count(id) from order_task A where del_flag!=1 and status=7 and A.parent_id=order_task.id) complate, (select count(id) from order_task B where del_flag!=1 and B.parent_id=order_task.id ) total from order_task left join sys_file on order_task.icon_id = sys_file.id left join order_receive on order_task.id = order_receive.order_id and order_receive.receiver_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} left join sys_confirm on sys_confirm.type='1' and order_task.id = sys_confirm.order_id and (one_partner_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or sec_partner_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and is_current=1 left join (select sys_user.id user_id,sys_file.id launcher_file_id,sys_file.origin_name launcher_file_origin_name, sys_file.name launcher_file_name,sys_file.create_date launcher_file_create_date from sys_user,sys_file where sys_user.icon = sys_file.id) A on A.user_id = order_task.launcher_id ) order_task
order by ${orderByClause}

select , (select count(id) from order_task A where del_flag!=1 and status=7 and A.parent_id=order_task.id) complate, (select count(id) from order_task B where del_flag!=1 and B.parent_id=order_task.id ) total from order_task left join sys_file on order_task.icon_id = sys_file.id left join order_receive on order_task.id = order_receive.order_id and order_receive.receiver_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} left join sys_confirm on sys_confirm.type=#{confirmType,jdbcType=TINYINT} and order_task.id = sys_confirm.order_id and (one_partner_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or sec_partner_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and is_current=1 left join (select sys_user.id user_id,sys_file.id launcher_file_id,sys_file.origin_name launcher_file_origin_name, sys_file.name launcher_file_name,sys_file.create_date launcher_file_create_date from sys_user,sys_file where sys_user.icon = sys_file.id) A on A.user_id = order_task.launcher_id where order_task.id=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select * from (select
distinct
,(select sum(money) from order_task a where parent_id=order_task.id and del_flag!=1) sum, (select count(id) from order_task A where del_flag!=1 and status=7 and A.parent_id=order_task.id) complate, (select count(id) from order_task B where del_flag!=1 and B.parent_id=order_task.id ) total from order_task left join sys_file on order_task.icon_id = sys_file.id inner join order_receive on order_receive.order_id = order_task.id left join (select sys_user.id user_id,sys_file.id launcher_file_id,sys_file.origin_name launcher_file_origin_name, sys_file.name launcher_file_name,sys_file.create_date launcher_file_create_date from sys_user,sys_file where sys_user.icon = sys_file.id) A on A.user_id = order_task.launcher_id ) order_task
order by ${orderByClause}
select email from sys_user where id=(select launcher_id from order_task where id=#{orderId})
